article_title: Mini Bonds Attract U.K. Buyers With High Yields and Treats
article_text:
A mix of high yields, tasty treats and curiosity has lured buyers into the U.K.'s "mini bonds" craze, but experts warn of threadbare paperwork and flimsy investor protections.

Staff at London fast-food chain Chilango have started popping marketing leaflets into lunch buyers' bags, asking them to buy "burrito bonds."

...

article_summary:
A mix of high yields, tasty treats and curiosity has lured buyers into the U.K.'s "mini bonds" craze, but experts warn of threadbare paperwork and flimsy investor protections.
Staff at London fast-food chain Chilango have started popping marketing leaflets into lunch buyers' bags, asking them to buy "burrito bonds."
